section.title: Violet Beauregarde
section.p: Violet Beauregarde is the third child to meet her demise.
Violet Beauregarde is the third child to get separated from the group.
She sees an experimental piece of bubblegum and determined to be the best, grabs it, despite being warned not to, and chews it. She quickly turns into a giant blueberry.

image.alt: A young girl turned into a giant blueberry.

section.p: After turning into a giant blueberry, she is rolled into another room where she explodes. Her pride caused her death.
After turning into a giant blueberry, she is rolled into another room where she is safely deflated. She will return to the group later.
